subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal, seeking a record seventh title at Roland Garros, won the first two sets against Novak Djokovic but then came apart and must wait until Monday to play again.
snippet: Rafael Nadal, seeking a record seventh title at Roland Garros, won the first two sets against Novak Djokovic but then came apart and must wait until Monday to play again.
